content.html: Tech has an ethics issue so deep People sit in rooms enabling harm as a day job, society normalises harm and it becomes woven into schools, work, finance, leisure And we are so unused to challenges to harm that we find them exceptional and more shocking than the harm itself
content.value:
Tech has an ethics issue so deep 

People sit in rooms enabling harm as a day job, society normalises harm and it becomes woven into schools, work, finance, leisure 

And we are so unused to challenges to harm that we find them exceptional and more shocking than the harm itself
